name: Buried Love
description:
Buried Love A  supernatural dating show. 

This is the first four days of Buried Love, an interactive fiction game. 

Welcome to your next big adventure. Buried Love. The show where we test whether romance really is dead. When your friends entered you into this dating show you never thought you'd get selected, but here you are, a moment away from potentially meeting the love of your life

Fed up with seeing you get picked up and dropped by a long line of emotionally deficient partners of the human variety, your friends decided to take your fate in their own hands and enter you into a dating show with a supernatural and mythical twist. It's been years since the doors were thrown wide open and everyone realised that the creatures of myth, fantasy and legend were real, but appear on reality television...now that's new.

For additional content, updates and character information please visit my Tumblr.

Characters

  • Alex - Werewolf
  • Rota - Valkyrie
  • Aayush - Vampire
  • Eli - Half-Elf
  • Abe - Human
  • Catarina - Bruxa
  • Cerri - Werewolf
  • TBC
